verbs.description: [ARG0: A caravan of hundreds of migrants] [V: reached] [ARG1: the US - Mexico border] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday afternoon] [ARGM-TMP: after a monthlong trip from Central America that has riled President Donald Trump] .
A caravan of hundreds of migrants reached the US - Mexico border on Sunday afternoon after a monthlong trip from Central America that [V: has] riled President Donald Trump .
A caravan of hundreds of migrants reached the US - Mexico border on Sunday afternoon after [ARG0: a monthlong trip from Central America] [R-ARG0: that] has [V: riled] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] .
